articles.description: A criminal defamation case has been filed by Babu Rawji Shah, who claims to be the adopted son of Gangubai, the brothel queen of Mumbai’s red-light district Kamathipura, on whose life the movie is based
articles.content: New Delhi: Director Sanjay Leela Bhansalis biographical drama Gangubai Kathiawadi has run into trouble with both the director and lead actor Alia Bhatt being summoned by court on 21 May in a criminal… [+1900 chars]

articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: R Madhavan tests positive for COVID-19 after Aamir Khan, writes: ‘Farhan has to follow Rancho’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: R Madhavan shared his COVID-19 diagnosis on social media while invoking the film 3 Idiots. His co-star from the film, Aamir Khan, tested positive for the virus on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Actor R Madhavan has tested positive for COVID-19. The actor took to social media to inform his followers about his coronavirus-positive, while mentioning the film 3 Idiots.
Madhavan tested positive… [+1077 chars]

articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Ranbir Kapoor, Riddhima attend dad Rishi Kapoor’s 11-month prayer meet: ‘We miss you’, see photo - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ranbir Kapoor and Riddhima Kapoor Sahni attended prayer meet on father Rishi Kapoor's 11-month death anniversary. Rishi Kapoor breathed his last on April 30 in Mumbai after battling cancer for two years.
articles.content: Actor Ranbir Kapoor and his sister Riddhima Kapoor Sahni attended a prayer meet in the memory of their father, late actor Rishi Kapoor. It is Rishi’s 11-month death anniversary on Thursday. Sharing a… [+1748 chars]

articles.author: Kriti Sonali
articles.title: Arjun-Malaika attend a cosy get-together with Karan Johar, Gauri Khan as Kareena is ‘waiting for the weekend’. See inside pics - The Indian Express
articles.description: It was party time as Karan Johar, Karisma Kapoor, Gauri Khan and Maheep Kapoor came together for some 'catching up'. However, it was Malaika Arora and Arjun Kapoor's presence that got all the eyeballs.
articles.content: The weekend seems to have come early this time. On Wednesday night, Bollywood besties Karan Johar, Malaika Arora, sister Amrita Arora, Karisma Kapoor, Gauri Khan, Maheep Kapoor, Natasha Poonawalla, S… [+1313 chars]

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Pakistani band Strings comes to an end, as heart-broken fans demand a concert: 'They pulled a One Direction on us' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Pakistani band Strings, best known for Dhani, and a few Bollywood songs, started out as a college band 33 years ago.
articles.content: Pakistani music band, Strings, announced the end of the band late Thursday, while insisting that the members, Bilal Maqsood and Faisal Kapadia, share a great bond. The band remained in function for 3… [+1473 chars]
